title: Usually avg 40 ping, Internet fine, today avg 120 ping
body: Usually I have 40 ping, gane runs smoothly. Internet is fine, everything else works, even other games have low ping, but today I ran around 120 ping. Is it a new patch thing? what's going on

replies.body: Despite a great intent connection, you can still run into network issues reaching the game servers.  It can result from packet loss, unstable connections, or even how your ISP was routing you to the game depending on when you were playing.  If this is still an issue, I suggest running through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
